feed.title: VoucherVault Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for VoucherVault: v1.15.0
entry.content:
[!TIP] You can now control the CSP directive frame-ancestors via the environment variable CSP_FRAME_ANCESTORS.

For example to allow remote sources to allow VoucherVault being loaded via iframe.

The X-Frame-Options header is considered depreacted and was removed.

Features

  • remove deprecated xfo header and use django-csp v4 with CSP frame-ancestors env; fixes #71 (ff38122)

entry.title: New release for VoucherVault: v1.16.0
entry.content:
[!TIP] Feature: This release supports displaying uploaded images directly in the web application besides providing a download button. Slight UI changes but nothing crucial.

[!CAUTION] Breaking Change: This release enables users, which have access to a shared item, to download and display the uploaded files for it. Otherwise, sharing does not make much sense.

Features

  • support displaying uploaded images; fixes #72 (06bb8aa)
